word: "WE SHOULD REMEMBER THAT THE CHURCH, ENFEEBLED AND DEFECTIVE THOUGH IT BE, IS THE ONLY OBJECT ON EARTH ON WHICH CHRIST BESTOWS HIS SUPREME REGARD. HE IS CONSTANTLY WATCHING IT WITH SOLICITUDE, AND IS STRENGTHENING IT BY HIS HOLY SPIRIT."--MANUSCRIPT 155, 1902 (NOV. 22, 1902). PUBLISHED IN SELECTED MESSAGES, B. 2, P. 396.
